key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on volatile raw materials like iron and steel
Regulatory risks tied to government funding and policies for water infrastructure projects
Intense competition from established players like Xylem Inc. and A.O. Smith
controversies: Open unfair labor practice case filed with the National Labor Relations Board (Region 10-CA-353355)
environmental_issues: Potential scrutiny over manufacturing processes and product lifecycle impacts despite sustainability initiatives
social_issues: Labor relations challenges highlighted by the unfair labor practice case
governance_issues: Board refreshment plan indicating ongoing governance changes
